main.name: Todd Rings
main.occupation: Web developer, programmer, manager, and educator
main.description: I design and program websites and web applications using JavaScript and React. I also taught English to children and business professionals in Seoul, South Korea for over 13 years.
main.bio: I am a violinist turned marketer turned ESL educator turned self-taught programmer. I current specialize in JavaScript (ECMAScript 5 and 6) along with an extra focus on React js. I believe that if something does not yet exist, it can be built. I am a creative thinker that also enjoys long walks along just about anything. When I am not trying to better myself by learning programming, I am either teaching a variety of South Korean adults English, or walking in excess of 20km a day (that means a pair of shoes does not last longer than a year). When I have time, I volunteer as a Cub Scout leader for the area of Seoul that I live. I have certification to lead cub scouts, and once I have returned to the states, I plan to receive certification to be a scout leader to young adults. If you want, I can even teach useful scouting knots that could one day save someone's life (or at least make a damn fine tent).

education.description: I studied Marketing with an International Emphasis at Texas Christian University in Fort Worth, TX. While there I also minored in Japanese. I was involved in 5 different students organizations, primarilly related with different cultures while also serving as president of an organization that originated as TCU's first table-top RPG organization.

work.title: Outsourced English Teacher || Freelance
work.description: Outsourced English Teacher to business professionals. I teach a 1:1 Business English and General Conversation class with an Executive at Lotte Home Shopping.

work.title: Outsourced English Teacher || Freelance
work.description: Outsourced English Teacher to business professionals. I teach a group of business professionals Business English and General Conversation at GS Holdings.

work.title: Outsourced English Teacher || Freelance
work.description: Outsourced English Teacher to business professionals. I teach a group of business professionals General Conversation at Hanyu Energy. I taught Business English and Debate to a group of upper management professionals at Hyundai Merchant Marines (Jan 2017 - Apr 2017)

work.title: Outsourced English Teacher || Freelance
work.description: Outsourced English Teacher to business professionals. I have taught at a variety of different companies ranging from 1:1 to small and large group classes.

work.title: Manager || Head Teacher Trainer
work.description: Manager of teacher trainer team at an ESL start-up company that specializes in pre-school ESL materials. I conducted demo lessons for new teachers at various Badanamu (product name) centers utilizing all in-house products and curriculum, communicated with various Badanamu center managers, conducted product training for new hires, communicated with upper management, and composed the company's monthly in-house newsletter.

work.title: After School English Teacher
work.description: Served as an English teacher with the school's after school program. My duties included lesson planning, progress reports, supplementary material creation, and classroom management for elementary students grades 1 through 6.

work.title: English Teacher || Manager, Head Native English Teacher
work.description: Prior to the restructuring of the English department, I served as the Head Native English teacher for the 2012 and 2013 school years at a top private elementary school in the Mapo district of Seoul. Alongside teaching duties such as lesson planning, test creation, supplementary material creation, and level testing, my other duties included teacher observations and evaluations, weekly meetings, communication with head of education department at the school. I also created, edited, and administered the school's first English newspaper created by the students, for the students.

work.title: English Teacher
work.description: Native English teacher at a private elementary school. Duties included lesson planning, test creation, supplementary material creation, and progress reports.

work.title: After School English Teacher
work.description: Served as an English teacher with the school's after school program. My duties included lesson planning, progress reports, and classroom management for elementary students grades 1 through 6.

work.title: Head English Teacher | Native English Teacher Manager
work.description: I served as the first English Head Teacher/Native English Teacher manager during TNL School's innaugural. Alongside teaching students of kindergarden and elementary ages, my duties included lesson planning, monthoy planning, training of new teachers, communicating with the school's owner and relaying information to the teachers, class creation, and curriculum planning.

work.title: English Teacher
work.description: Taught English to kindergarden and elementary school students at an English Language academy. Along with teaching, I was required to make lesson plans, monthly progress reports, supplimentary homework, and assist in a variety of other non-teaching duties.
